mobile.title: Mobile Application
mobile.description: Download the Attendee Android app to manage your events on the go.
mobile.scan_description: Scan this QR code with your phone to download the app directly
mobile.download_auto: The download should start automatically. If not,
mobile.step_1: Download the APK file by clicking the button above
mobile.step_3: Open the downloaded APK file and follow the instructions
mobile.step_4: Launch the app and sign in with your credentials
mobile.feature_1: View current, upcoming, and past events
mobile.compatibility_desc: This app requires Android 5.0 (Lollipop) or later. For questions or issues, contact the system administrator.
